short_summary: Delivery of shock resistant equipment for naval ships and submarines.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for shock resistant equipment for naval ships and submarines. Delivery is requested at CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt. Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
duration_in_months: You could still place a bid
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement
### Summary

* Solicitation number: W8482-231033/A
* Tender reference number: PW-22-01013617

The Canadian Federal Government is seeking proposals for the delivery of firehose equipment to the Department of National Defence (DND). The contract is subject to a request for proposal and has a procurement method of competitive, open bidding.

### Background

The Department of National Defence announces a tender opportunity for the acquisition of firehose equipment consisting of Siamese connections, fire hose, part number 014386-6, with NCAGE codes (35943) and (SCK95). The equipment will be delivered to the Canadian Forces Bases (CFBs) in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and Esquimalt, British Columbia.

### Tender Requirements

* Reference: PW-22-01013617
* Solicitation number: W8482-231033/A
* Tender closing date: December 9, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* SHIPMENT ADDRESS: federal common address

The tender should include the following items:
+ 62 units of part number 014386-6 from (35943) or (SCK95) will be shipped to CFB Halifax
+ 95 units of part number 014386-6 from (35943) or (SCK95) will be shipped to CFB Esquimalt

It is expected to pay in Canadian dollars.

The standard terms and conditions of the General Services Administration (GSA) will apply.

### Documents for Reference

The following documents are referenced:
* *003-007-SG-000 On behalf of specification relative to anticrock equipment onboard of the navy ships sealed letter
* W8482-231003 amendment060 001 EN
RFp abbreviated Source Files).



Please contact the contracting authority for clarification. The contracting authority has the right to negotiate with vendors directly.
 
Contact information of the contracting authority:
 mail: SOPHIE.SINCENNES@forces.gc.ca. More information can be found on the [Canada.Buying.caida.ca web site](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders/open-tenders.tiles/Tender_Notice(EN).asp).

Limit the most important and relevant information, and make sure that the text does not become too verbose.
